mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_email, user_img, user_introduce FROM Member WHERE user_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') OR user_nickname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%')

SELECT f.feed_id, f.user_id, f.feed_content, f.feed_time, f.like_amount, m.user_name, m.user_img, fi.img_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Comments c WHERE c.feed_id = f.feed_id) AS comment_count FROM Feed f JOIN Member m ON f.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN Feed_Image fi ON f.feed_id = fi.feed_id WHERE f.feed_content LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') ORDER BY f.feed_time DESC

SELECT f.feed_id, f.user_id, f.feed_content, f.feed_time, f.like_amount, m.user_name, m.user_img, fi.img_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Comments c WHERE c.feed_id = f.feed_id) AS comment_count FROM Feed f JOIN Feed_Hashtag fh ON f.feed_id = fh.feed_id JOIN Hashtag h ON fh.hashtag_id = h.hashtag_id JOIN Member m ON f.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN Feed_Image fi ON f.feed_id = fi.feed_id WHERE h.hashtag LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('#', #{keyword}), '%') ORDER BY f.feed_time DESC

SELECT f.feed_id, f.user_id, f.feed_content, f.feed_time, f.like_amount, m.user_name, m.user_img, fi.img_name FROM Feed f JOIN Member m ON f.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN Feed_Image fi ON f.feed_id = fi.feed_id WHERE f.feed_id = #{feedId}

SELECT f.feed_id, f.user_id, f.feed_content, f.feed_time, f.like_amount, c.comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.comment_content, c.parent_id, c.comment_time, m.user_name, m.user_img FROM Feed f LEFT JOIN Comment c ON f.feed_id = c.feed_id JOIN Member m ON c.user_id = m.user_id WHERE f.feed_id = #{feedId}
